name: pipeline
label: Pipeline
description: The Jenkinsfile used to define the Continous Delivery pipeline

valueChoices.descriptionMarkdown:
Maven based pipeline which:

* creates a new version then builds and deploys the project into the maven repository
* runs an integration test in the **Test** environment
valueChoices.label: Release
valueChoices.name: Release
valueChoices.description:
Maven based pipeline which:

  • creates a new version then builds and deploys the project into the maven repository
  • runs an integration test in the Test environment

valueChoices.descriptionMarkdown:
Maven based pipeline which:

* creates a new version then builds and deploys the project into the maven repository
* runs an integration test in the **Test** environment
* stages the new version into the **Stage** environment
valueChoices.label: Release and Stage
valueChoices.name: Release and Stage
valueChoices.description:
Maven based pipeline which:

  • creates a new version then builds and deploys the project into the maven repository
  • runs an integration test in the Test environment
  • stages the new version into the Stage environment

valueChoices.descriptionMarkdown:
Maven based pipeline which:

* creates a new version then builds and deploys the project into the maven repository
* runs an integration test in the **Test** environment
* stages the new version into the **Stage** environment
* waits for **Approval** to promote 
* promotes to the **Run** environment
valueChoices.label: Release, Stage, Approve and Promote
valueChoices.name: Release, Stage, Approve and Promote
valueChoices.description:
Maven based pipeline which:

  • creates a new version then builds and deploys the project into the maven repository
  • runs an integration test in the Test environment
  • stages the new version into the Stage environment
  • waits for Approval to promote
  • promotes to the Run environment
